item.title: By: Barbara Lukas
item.dc:creator: Barbara Lukas
item.description: I just arrived in Adelaide and am looking forward to a week of tourism before the conference. I learnt that there is a National Wool Museum near Melbourne and, that New Zealand has merino/possum/silk clothing to die for..... As is usual, the Customs Officer who greeted me into Australia had no clue what "rug hooking" is. This is common throughout the world. See everyone soon. Barbara
item.content:encoded:
I just arrived in Adelaide and am looking forward to a week of tourism before the conference. I learnt that there is a National Wool Museum near Melbourne and, that New Zealand has merino/possum/silk clothing to die for…..
As is usual, the Customs Officer who greeted me into Australia had no clue what “rug hooking” is. This is common throughout the world.
See everyone soon.
Barbara
